name: Nancy E. FULTON, Appellee, v. Richard W. FULTON and Frances L. Fulton, his wife, Appellants

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Nancy E. FULTON, Appellee, v. Richard W. FULTON and Frances L. Fulton, his wife, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Neil J. Marcus, Scott W. Spadafore, Carol L. Hanna, Monongahela, for appellants.
Charles C. Keller, Richard J. Amrhein, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
625 A.2d 52
Nancy E. FULTON, Appellee, v. Richard W. FULTON and Frances L. Fulton, his wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1993.
Decided May 26, 1993.
Neil J. Marcus, Scott W. Spadafore, Carol L. Hanna, Monongahela, for appellants.
Charles C. Keller, Richard J. Amrhein, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
